title: Sexcapades:  Genie and the Guards
description: She took her pleasure from their protection.Coven leader Genie Wilde is ready to marry her top warlock, sexy Rafael Reyes…until hot as sin warlock, Ethan Ravenwood, offers her an enticing alliance to protect their covens. Genie accepts his offer to wield his magic upon her body, and more, despite Rafael’s threat to walk. When Rafael interrupts the couple in bed, Ethan’s allure brings him to his knees…and Rafael reconsiders a lifetime of pleasuring Genie and Ethan.About the series: Sexcapades is a series of uninhibited sexual escapades from your favorite best-selling romance authors. www.sexcapades-stories.com
author: Alexea Leigh
